page.title: 16Library Resources,Tiptree
page.content: Crispin and I received a reply to the letter we sent asking to look through the files.Mrs Towler had said we could ,so at eleven o'clock Crispin and I went to Tiptree Library.Mrs Towler showed us the books and let us get on and work.We read about Tiptree Priory. There were some maps that showed where the important places were.We found out that Tiptree Priory was dedicated to the S.S.,which probably is why there is a tunnel running underneath the Priory.We also found out that Tiptree Heath was in the Domesday Book but it was called "Woodland for Swine",because people used to put their animals there so that they could eat.Tiptree Priory is the oldest building in Tiptree at 415 years old.
